item.title: Automated Driving
item.description: Here I will write a post about my thesis research. The report can be found here.

item.title: About
item.description: I am a Data Scientist üë®‚Äçüî¨ born and trained in the Netherlands and based in Helsinki, Finland. Currently I am working in Ramboll’s Digital Mobility Lab, where I develop and apply new digital methods for mobility analytics. By training I am both a Civil Engineer specialised in transportation science and an Urban Planner trained in the spatial impacts of mobility. I am fascinated by the dynamics in cities and I consider it my mission to contribute to liveable cities through data science methods.
